## Goal
Create a complete textbook that teaches Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics from basics to advanced humanoid control.

## Audience
- Undergraduate / Graduate students
- Robotics & AI learners
- Developers using ROS2

## Scope
- Embodied Intelligence
- ROS2 Fundamentals
- Gazebo, Unity, NVIDIA Isaac simulation
- Humanoid locomotion & manipulation
- Vision-Language-Action models
- Safety & reliability standards

## Deliverables
- Docusaurus-based textbook
- Code examples
- Simulation workflows
- AI-powered chatbot support
